catentdesc.name: Emery Black Leather Flats
catentdesc.shortdescription: Chic flats enhanced with a decorative metal piece
catentdesc.longdescription: This modern take on a classic flats design makes this a perfect fit for any occasion. The decorative metal piece along with the frills adds to the style quotient. Subtle and chic, these leather flats are convenient and attractive.

catentdesc.name: Coolers Fabric & Leather Flats
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fabric and leather flats with a decorative fabric piece
catentdesc.longdescription: Casual yet elegant these stylish flats can be teemed with anything from jeans to dresses. The soft, breathable fabric lining adds to the comfort and the decorative piece gives glamor to this everyday wear.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower White & Brown Patent Leather Flats
catentdesc.shortdescription: Elegant white and brown leather flats with a tiny jelly bow, contrast cap toe, and contrast lining
catentdesc.longdescription: Dainty and smart, this patent leather slip-on flat shoes will give a boost to your image. The tiny polka dots on the body and the contrast toe cap adds to the elegance while the jelly bow enhances your feminine side. The padded insole never tires your feet and the breathable lining keeps your feet fresh.

catentdesc.name: Emery Black Synthetic Pumps
catentdesc.shortdescription: Synthetic pumps with decorative work and low wedge heels
catentdesc.longdescription: A must for every wardrobe, these black synthetic flats go with any occasion and any dress or jeans. The decorative work on the vamp adds style to this classic design, while the soft insole and the low wedge heels give comfort to your feet.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Silver Synthetic Flats
catentdesc.shortdescription: Synthetic silver flats with seam detailing and pointed toe
catentdesc.longdescription: Classic and elegant, these silver flats enhance the occasion and makes your dress even more attractive. The soft synthetic lining, cushioned insole, and the manmade sole adds to the comfort. Giving these flats a new dimension is the seam detailing.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Brown Peep-toe Stilettos
catentdesc.shortdescription: Embossed leather high-heeled pumps with platform
catentdesc.longdescription: Elegant and chic, these brown stilettos with open-toe style adds style to your wardrobe. The soft leather lining and the leather sole adds to the comfort and keeps your feet fresh.

catentdesc.name: Emery Silver Open-toe Pumps
catentdesc.shortdescription: Silver open-toe pumps with decorative buckle and fabric detailing
catentdesc.longdescription: Elegance oozes out of these pumps as they brighten up your evening. Team it up with a classy dress and the silver fabric detailing and the buckle will do the rest. The soft synthetic lining provides the comfort and the Peep toe design enhances the beauty of your feet.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Brown Fabric Stiletto Pumps
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fabric pumps with open toe and decorative bow
catentdesc.longdescription: These brown fabric stiletto pumps give a casual and smart look. Be it the office or a day out, the comfortable platform and the fabric lining keep your feet from aching. The open toe design keeps your feet fresh and the fabric detailing with the decorative bow at the vamp gives it class.

catentdesc.name: Synergy Brown Leather Stiletto Pumps
catentdesc.shortdescription: Brown stiletto pumps with leather detailing and black platform
catentdesc.longdescription: Modern and elegant, these stiletto pumps can take over a party. The brown leather detailing adds style to the design and the black platform gives lift to your walk.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Silver Patent Leather Stiletto Pumps
catentdesc.shortdescription: Silver patent leather stiletto pumps with open toe and platform
catentdesc.longdescription: Sophisticated silver stiletto pumps with thick platform. The synthetic lining adds comfort and the cushioned insole along with the open toe design keeps your feet fresh. The tiny polka dots and the seam detailing add an additional dimension to this design.

catentdesc.name: Synergy Brown Laced Ankle Boots
catentdesc.shortdescription: Brown leather ankle boots with laced front and seam detailing
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple and stylish, these brown leather boots can be teamed with skirts or leggings or jeans not just for looks, but for comfort too. The soft breathable leather lining and the padded insole pamper your feet, while the straight lines and the seam detailing add to the classy feel.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Gray Layered Ankle Boots
catentdesc.shortdescription: Gray ankle boot with layered look and stiletto
catentdesc.longdescription: The clean lines and the gray finish give this ankle boot a fresh feel. The layering at the ankle and the snub toe add to the sophisticated look. Add to that the padded insole and the soft lining and these boots are a match made in heaven for your feet.

catentdesc.name: Emery Gray Stiletto Mid-Calf Boots
catentdesc.shortdescription: Gray microsuede mid-calf boots with stilettos and modern buckle
catentdesc.longdescription: Elegant microsuede mid-calf boots that can be slipped on and buckled up with minimum effort. The clean lines, platform, and stilettos enhance the classic silhouette. Comfort is provided with the padded insole and the soft lining.

catentdesc.name: Synergy Short Black Leather Boots
catentdesc.shortdescription: Short black leather shoes with decorative buckle
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple, classic design elevated with seam detailing and decorative buckle. The snub toe and the heels give it an excellent silhouette. Team it with skirts or leggings to enhance the style quotient. The padded insole and the soft lining give your feet comfort.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Brown Microsuede Stiletto Mid-Calf Boot
catentdesc.shortdescription: Brown microsuede mid-calf boots with stilettos and modern buckle
catentdesc.longdescription: Mid-calf boots that can be slipped on and buckled up with minimum effort. The clean lines, platform, and stilettos enhance the classic silhouette. Elegant and comfortable, these boots have a soft microsuede upper, padded insole, and the soft lining.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Black Leather Stiletto Boots
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black leather stiletto boots with almond toe
catentdesc.longdescription: Clean lines and stilettos define this classic design. The silhouette is perfect and add miles to your legs. The slightly padded footbed and the soft lining keep your feet cosy. Dress up your feet with the stylish shaft and the almond toe.
